text: Asthikal Pookkunnu is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Sreekumar, starring Murali and Chithra in the lead roles. The back ground score of the movie is composed by Raveendran ==Cast== * Murali as Sreedharan/Bhaskaran * Chithra as Rajamma * M. Chandran Nair as Ashan * A. R. Antony as Padmanabhan * Kamala Kamesh as Sreedharan's mother * Kothuku Nanappan as Sinha * Narendra Prasad as Govindan * Santhadevi as Itti ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Asthikal Pookkunnu
